title: PMG Technologies
author: ''
date: '2022-08-31'
slug: pmg_technologies
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $8.9M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with PMG Technologies. The average
  contract duration was 0.65 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.3M. The longest
  contract was 3.02 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $79.7M.
lookup_name: 'PMG TECHNOLOGIES'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '8.9M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '122'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '33'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '27%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '231%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.03'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '19.6M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.65'
s421_mean_contract_value: '1.3M'
s425_max_duration: '3.02'
s422_max_contract_value: '79.7M'
---
